Articles.Content: so I've had this glitch with the JSI RasterPropMonitor, it would show up a few textures when i zoom up, including a kerbal's suit, i have texture replacer on but i'm not sure if that's why, if it is can someone provide a solution? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/105821-105-rasterpropmonitor-still-putting-the-a-in-iva-v0241-30-november-2015/&page=27#comment-2318177
All I can suggest is that you make sure you have the latest version and reinstall it.
